data.comment: The match has started at Nissan Stadium.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kashiwa.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos are caught offside.
In the minute 5, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Michael Olunga for Kashiwa drives towards goal at Nissan Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 8, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Richardson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 13, Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Yokohama Marinos defender.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Takuma Ominami (Kashiwa) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 16, Yokohama Marinos are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 18, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Kashiwa.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 21, Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Kashiwa's area.
In the minute 23, Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Yokohama Marinos have an attacking throw-in.
Jun Amano of Yokohama Marinos smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In the minute 24, In Yokohama Kashiwa drive forward through Michael Olunga. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 26, In Yokohama, Yokohama Marinos push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Kashiwa advance rapidly upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura blows for offside.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 29, Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Yokohama.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kashiwa.
Goal kick for Kashiwa at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Kashiwa at Nissan Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos drives forward and Marcos Junior gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick Kashiwa.
Kashiwa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 35, Ataru Esaka for Kashiwa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
The away team replace Tatsuya Yamashita with Naoki Kawaguchi.
Yokohama Marinos pushes forward through Edigar Junio, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
At Nissan Stadium, Kashiwa are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 45, Yokohama Marinos's Erik is on target but unsuccessful.
The first-half is over at Nissan Stadium.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Kashiwa make their second substitution with Sachiro Toshima replacing Yusuke Segawa.
Ange Postecoglou is making the team's fourth substitution at Nissan Stadium with Yuki Otsu replacing Kota Mizunuma.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa just outside Yokohama Marinos's area.
In the minute 48, Il-kyu Park (Yokohama Marinos) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
In the minute 49, Naoki Kawaguchi (Kashiwa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Kashiwa push upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 50, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa.
At Nissan Stadium, Kashiwa are penalized for being offside.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Yokohama Marinos, close to Kashiwa's area.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos's Takuya Kida gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 57, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a first substitution, with Takahiro Ogihara replacing Marcos Junior.
In the minute 60, Eitaro Matsuda is replacing Erik for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
The home team have replaced Edigar Junio with Ado Onaiwu. This is the third substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Kashiwa take a 0-1 lead thanks to Michael Olunga.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Nissan Stadium.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 64, Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Yokohama Marinos have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 66, Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Masatoshi Mihara is on a sub for Richardson for Kashiwa.
Hiroto Goya is replacing Hayato Nakama for the away team.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
In the minute 74, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Ado Onaiwu grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Nissan Stadium.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 80, In Yokohama, Jun Amano of Yokohama Marinos is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 82, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Kota Watanabe is replacing Jun Amano for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Nelsinho Baptista is making the team's fifth substitution at Nissan Stadium with Shunki Takahashi replacing Ataru Esaka.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Nissan Stadium.
Free kick Kashiwa.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Kosuke Nakamura is booked for the away team.
